quote: ... I should have been struck down by the despair a young lover feels who has sworn lifelong fidelity, when a friend speaks to him of the other mistresses he will have in time to come.
quote_letters: I SHOULD HAVE BEEN STRUCK DOWN BY THE DESPAIR A YOUNG LOVER FEELS WHO HAS SWORN LIFELONG FIDELITY WHEN A FRIEND SPEAKS TO HIM OF THE OTHER MISTRESSES HE WILL HAVE IN TIME TO COME
